routines.name: The Line Up
description_lines: Arrange all reds in a line up the middle of the table, in line with the blue, pink, and black spots.
Pot the balls in order (i.e. red, colour, red, and so on), trying to make as high a break as possible.

routines.name: The T Line Up
description_lines: Arrange the reds in three lines of five reds, first between pink and black, then either side of the pink, to form a "T" shape.
Pot the balls in order (i.e. red, colour, red, and so on), trying to make as high a break as possible.
In this routine, all reds are nearer the pink and black, so this replicates what you might see in a match, more than the Line Up would.

routines.name: The 10 Red T Line Up
description_lines: A slight variation on the T Line Up. Put four reds in a line between pink and black, then three either side of the pink, to make 10 reds in total.
Pot the balls in order (i.e. red, colour, red, and so on), trying to make as high a break as possible.

routines.name: The 7 Red T Line Up
description_lines: A slight variation on the T Line Up. Put three reds in a line between pink and black, then two either side of the pink, to make seven reds in total.
Pot the balls in order (i.e. red, colour, red, and so on), trying to make as high a break as possible.

routines.name: Clearing The Colours
description_lines: Put all colours on their spots, then try to clear them in order, i.e. yellow, green, brown, blue, pink, black.
